hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Bombs (10 pieces)# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Fountain# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #inside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that ##outside Ganon's Castle## has #1# major item.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #Din's Fire#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)# and #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the way of the hero.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# is on the path to #the Tower#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Hammer Room Switch Chest

HC (Malon).text: Did you know that you can have complete control over the item placement, item pool, and more, using Plandomizer?

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Slingshot Shooting Gallery#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Trail# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Training Ground# hoards #the Prelude of Light#.
hinted_locations: Gerudo Training Ground Maze Path Third Chest

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Epona's Song#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that paying a #fee to the Gerudos# grants access to #Dodongo's Cavern#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is on the path to #the Tower#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that ##the Gerudo Training Ground## has #8# major items.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: Are you stuck? Try asking for help in our Discord server or check out our Wiki!

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Light Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Lab).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Desert Colossus# sands echo with #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Purple Rupee#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that the #Flare Dancer atop the Fire Temple# guards a chest containing #a Goron Tunic#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Deku Stick#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that in the #crater, a spider in a crate and a single scrub# guard...^ #a Fish Bottle# and #a Bow#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #Epona's Song#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.
